name: gnss_tracker
description: GNSS track app for edge devices and web browser

scripts.debug: test -d ./dist || mkdir ./dist; node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t babelify --plugin esmify --plugin tinyify ./js/main.js -d > ./dist/bundle.js
scripts.dist: test -d ./dist || mkdir ./dist; node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t babelify --plugin esmify --plugin tinyify ./js/main.js > ./dist/bundle.js

author: Jeancarlo Hidalgo
